name: Croquettes Not Included
description:
Welcome and be amazed!

This game represents one of the harder things in life: Herding cats to take a picture with all of 'em. And we gave them skateboards just to make it juicier.

Each day you need to put your cats in the photography studio (up right) and press SPACE to take a picture of them. The more cats in the picture, the better!

Cats have names too! You can't see it but they totally do!
